channel.title: Will give Rep++ (And 30 day RuneScape Card) for Help!
channel.description:
[b]I will give whoever helps me Rep++ and a 30 Day RuneScape Membership Card's PIN Number (But only if the help information recieced works)[/b]
I have a very important question, that must be answered URGENTLY, or the development of my server may not be able to continue. Now, what i'm about to ask you may seem pretty simple to effect an entire server, but let me explain to you how it WILL if the problem doesn't resolve:
1. This will be used in the beginning stage when a player creates a new account: He/She must complete a quest which then activates the player's account once complete.
2. It will be used in other quests, or just as an additional help 'hint' for other things.
3. It will signal player's in Wilderness PVP where their attacker is.
4. It will be used in certain minigames, and will also signal player's where certain NPCs are.
The question is: How do you add the Hint Icon (Yellow Arrow) above an NPC's head, or over certain coordinates for a 508 server? NOT OVER A PLAYER'S HEAD, but above certain NPC's/Coordinates! Please this feature is needed in so many updates that I have that it isn't even funny, but as promised, I will give anybody who helps me Rep++, and the Activation Code that WORKS for 30 days of RuneScape Membership.
IT MUST BE FOR A 508 SERVER- Thanks.

item.title: Will give Rep++ (And 30 day RuneScape Card) for Help!
item.dc:creator: @QuestMaster_2K10 QuestMaster 2K10
item.description:
@QuestMaster_2K10 wrote:

Yeah no shit homes, you act like i’m a beginner, I just need the server-side method to write to my server.

Read full topic
item.source: Will give Rep++ (And 30 day RuneScape Card) for Help!

item.title: Will give Rep++ (And 30 day RuneScape Card) for Help!
item.dc:creator: @Cabby Cabby
item.description:
@Cabby wrote:

Well, it’s been so long since I’ve done anything with servers but, just so you know, to actually be able to see the yellow arrow above a person would be client-side. But putting it there would be server-side.

Read full topic
item.source: Will give Rep++ (And 30 day RuneScape Card) for Help!

item.title: Will give Rep++ (And 30 day RuneScape Card) for Help!
item.dc:creator: @QuestMaster_2K10 QuestMaster 2K10
item.description:
@QuestMaster_2K10 wrote:

I will give whoever helps me Rep++ and a 30 Day RuneScape Membership Card’s PIN Number (But only if the help information recieced works)

I have a very important question, that must be answered URGENTLY, or the development of my server may not be able to continue. Now, what i’m about to ask you may seem pretty simple to effect an entire server, but let me explain to you how it WILL if the problem doesn’t resolve:

  1. This will be used in the beginning stage when a player creates a new account: He/She must complete a quest which then activates the player’s account once complete.

  2. It will be used in other quests, or just as an additional help ‘hint’ for other things.

  3. It will signal player’s in Wilderness PVP where their attacker is.

  4. It will be used in certain minigames, and will also signal player’s where certain NPCs are.

The question is: How do you add the Hint Icon (Yellow Arrow) above an NPC’s head, or over certain coordinates for a 508 server? NOT OVER A PLAYER’S HEAD, but above certain NPC’s/Coordinates! Please this feature is needed in so many updates that I have that it isn’t even funny, but as promised, I will give anybody who helps me Rep++, and the Activation Code that WORKS for 30 days of RuneScape Membership.

IT MUST BE FOR A 508 SERVER- Thanks.

Read full topic
